title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
EB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, if the report design is located at $project/test, and we include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary, the relative path should be generated and saved correctly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create or open a report design located in $project/test.
3. Include a library by selecting the library file at $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
